sentences.english: That's how schoolyard bullies run playgrounds and global godfathers do it everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 这就是校园欺负运行操场和全球教父做到无处不在。

sentences.english: Even today, god parents will often give shoes to their godchild on this occasion.
sentences.chinese: 即使是今天，教父教母给教子的礼物仍常常是鞋。

sentences.english: On the third flight lay a heap of dead men's heads, and they directed him still another flight higher.
sentences.chinese: 三楼是一堆死人头，它们也说教父住在上面一层。

sentences.english: Father Sampaio operates The House of Support for Refugees in buildings behind the church.
sentences.chinese: Sampaio教父经营着教堂后的难民援助屋。

sentences.english: But other talents still manage to emerge, independent of those two mighty godfathers .
sentences.chinese: 但仍有才华得以闪现，独立于两位教父级大师。

sentences.english: Of the early fathers of the Church, only Tertullian seems to have questioned the teaching.
sentences.chinese: 早期的教父当中，只有特土良对此教导有疑问。

sentences.english: They were two very different godfathers , separated by thousands of kilometers of ocean.
sentences.chinese: 两位截然不同的教父，他们中间隔著数千公里的海洋。

sentences.english: Sirius also became the godfather of Harry Potter.
sentences.chinese: 后来小天狼星成为波特的教父。

sentences.english: Many people follow the fine Christian custom of having godparents for their baptized children.
sentences.chinese: 很多人遵守基督徒的良好传统，为受洗的孩子找教父。

sentences.english: "That's what your Godfather figures, " Hagen said.
sentences.chinese: “你教父也是这样认为的，”黑根说。

sentences.english: A spokesman for Blair last night declined to comment on the godfather link.
sentences.chinese: 布莱尔的发言人昨晚拒绝就教父这层关系发表评论。

sentences.english: Her grandfather is a jovial, ruddy-faced old gentleman.
sentences.chinese: 她的教父是一位脸色红润的幽默老绅士。

sentences.english: To me he was like a godfather," he said.
sentences.chinese: 对我来说，他就像一位教父。

sentences.english: When he threatened to kill Pentangeli's family members Godfather was hitting the soft underbelly.
sentences.chinese: 教父使出围魏救赵之计，威胁杀害老潘的家人来解危。

sentences.english: Obama is now the big Daddy in black culture and when he speaks it’ll matter.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马现在是黑人文化的教父，一言九鼎。

definition: big shot (leading some field or group)/godfather
bunch of gangsters/criminal gang/organized crime syndicate
lit. big crocodile/fig. major figure/big shot/top boss (esp. criminal)
